Package task1

Class AbstractMetroStation

java.lang.Object
task1.AbstractMetroStation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetroStationWithCollection
public abstract class AbstractMetroStation extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing metro station with name, opened year and operating hour data. Access to the sequence of hours, name and opened year is represented by abstract methods. It implements Serializable interface.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
